app.dashboard.title: Helm
app.dashboard.state.empty_managers: No active managers. Enable managers on the Managers tab.
app.packages.tab.title: Packages
app.managers.tab.title: Managers
app.settings.tab.title: Settings
app.settings.alert.reset.title: Reset Local Data?
app.settings.alert.reset.message: This will clear all cached data and return Helm to its initial state. Your installed packages will not be affected.
app.settings.alert.upgrade_all.title: Upgrade All Packages?
app.settings.alert.upgrade_all.safe_mode: Safe Mode is enabled, so macOS software updates will be blocked. Pinned packages are excluded.
app.settings.alert.upgrade_all.standard_: Pinned packages are excluded. Choose the OS update option only when you explicitly want softwareupdate to run.
app.onboarding.welcome.title: Welcome to Helm
app.onboarding.welcome.subtitle:
One place to manage all your
package managers — simple and fast
app.onboarding.detection.title: Finding Your Tools
app.onboarding.detection.none_detected: No package managers found yet — you can add them later.
app.onboarding.detection.found_count: {count, plural, one {Found # package manager — great start!} other {Found # package managers — looking good!}}
app.onboarding.configure.title: Pick Your Managers
app.onboarding.configure.subtitle:
Turn on the managers you'd like
Helm to keep an eye on.
app.onboarding.configure.none_detected: No package managers found yet — you can add them later.
app.onboarding.configure.install_later:
Don't worry — you can always add
more from the Managers tab later.
app.onboarding.settings.title: Recommended Settings
app.onboarding.settings.subtitle:
Review these defaults.
You can change them anytime in Settings.
app.onboarding.settings.safe_mode_descri: Blocks macOS system updates from Helm
app.onboarding.settings.auto_clean_descr: Removes old Homebrew keg versions after upgrade
app.managers.alert.install.title: Install {manager}?
app.managers.alert.update.title: Update {manager}?
app.managers.alert.update.message: This will run the manager's supported update flow.
app.managers.alert.uninstall.title: Uninstall {manager}?
app.managers.alert.uninstall.message: This will remove {manager_short} from your system.
app.dry_run.title: Dry Run
app.inspector.title: Inspector
app.inspector.empty: Select a task, package, or manager to inspect details.
app.popover.banner.disconnected.title: Service disconnected
app.popover.banner.disconnected.message: Helm is reconnecting to the background service.
app.popover.banner.failed.title: {count} task failures need review
app.popover.banner.failed.message: Review recent tasks before running more updates.
app.popover.banner.updates.title: {count} updates ready
app.popover.banner.updates.message: Run update all now or review details in the control center.
app.overlay.search.title: Package Search
app.overlay.settings.title: Quick Settings
app.overlay.about.title: About Helm
app.overlay.about.name: Helm
app.overlay.about.subtitle: Unified package control for macOS
app.overlay.quit.title: Quit Helm
app.overlay.quit.message: Quit now? {tasks} running tasks may be interrupted.
app.control_center.subtitle: Operational visibility and package controls
app.walkthrough.popover.step1.title: System Health
app.walkthrough.popover.step1.descriptio: This is your Helm status icon. It shows your system health at a glance.
app.walkthrough.popover.step2.title: Updates Banner
app.walkthrough.popover.step2.descriptio: When updates are available, they appear here. Tap to upgrade all at once.
app.walkthrough.popover.step3.title: Active Tasks
app.walkthrough.popover.step3.descriptio: Running operations appear here so you always know what Helm is doing.
app.walkthrough.popover.step4.title: Manager Snapshot
app.walkthrough.popover.step4.descriptio: A quick snapshot of your detected package managers and their status.
app.walkthrough.popover.step5.title: Footer Actions
app.walkthrough.popover.step5.descriptio: Check version info, open settings, or quit Helm from here.
app.walkthrough.popover.step6.title: Quick Search
app.walkthrough.popover.step6.descriptio: Search across all your package managers instantly.
app.walkthrough.control_center.step1.des: Navigate between sections to manage your entire development environment.
app.walkthrough.control_center.step2.des: Your system health dashboard. See everything at a glance.
app.walkthrough.control_center.step3.des: Browse, search, install, and manage packages across all managers.
app.walkthrough.control_center.step4.des: Every operation Helm runs is tracked here. Cancel running tasks anytime.
app.walkthrough.control_center.step5.des: Enable, disable, and monitor your package managers.
app.walkthrough.control_center.step6.des: Configure safe mode, language, and automatic update policies.
app.walkthrough.control_center.step7.des: Preview exactly what will happen before running upgrades.
